descriptionHtml:
I finally found an easier way to recreate Nina/Aurora

Required Mods (Download and install them in this order)

Tools:

SKSE: http://skse.silverlock.org/
SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?
RaceMenu Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?

Models & Textures:

Enhanced Character Edit: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?
Download and install the old version 0.85, I recommend disabling the .esp after installing the mod]

Aurora/ Eryniel Textures:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52115/?
or
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30175/?

Both uses the same body textures. Download the version which correspond to the body shape that you are using and extract the textures from Aurora or Eryniel]

Location of Eryniel textures: Data/textures/actors/character/Eryniel [select only the .dds files]
Location of Aurora Textures: Data/textures/Actors/character/AuroraFollower [there are 3 folders, 2 of them are for different body types, open the one you use and copy its textures]

Place the textures at: Data/textures/Actors/character/female

The Eyes Of Beauty: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
Brows: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?

Instructions:

After downloading and installing all mods mentioned above.
Follow these steps:

1. Download my mod and place it at data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Nord Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Select the slot 0 and press F9, this should load my character face.
9. Customize your character as you please

Credits:

All the credit goes to the mod's authors.
author: shadowfake aka taveira
